pageContext.title: Debut Theme Sticky Navbar (PRO)
pageContext.description:
Sticky navigation bar for the Debut Shopify theme. Coded by a certified Shopify partner.


One image is worth a thousand words, but one live preview's worthiness is beyond evaluation! So check this sticky navbar working live here: 


→ Live Demo ←


Installation & Features:


Installation takes less than 1 minute.


This version comes with multiple customization choices embedded in the Customize page.


The features are:


✔️ Sticky navbar on desktop

✔️ Sticky navbar on mobile

✔️ Sticky navbar on homepage only

✔️ Navbar font size (choose unique values for desktop/mobile)

✔️ Sticky announcement bar on desktop

✔️ Sticky announcement bar on mobile

✔️ Sticky announcement bar on homepage only 

✔️ Announcement bar font size (choose unique values for desktop/mobile) 

✔️ Add subtle shadow below navbar

✔️ Enhancement: when clicking on “search” page jumps to top

✔️ Enhancement: when opening the menu page jumps to top 

✔️ Enhancement: Search input re-coded from scratch to work with both sticky navbar and the announcement bar



You just need to copy and paste the files that come with this. Detailed instructions plus all features can be found here: 


https://ezfycode.com/blog/debut-shopify-theme-how-to-add-swipe-for-product-page-images


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to me:


ezfycode@gmail.com


Important Notes:


✓ This code works exclusively on the Debut theme. Unsure whether it would work on your theme? Send us an email and we'll be more than happy to help you figure it out.


﻿ezfycode@gmail.com


Thank you!
